unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Sparking Interest Ahead of Onam!**
normalised: Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Sparking Interest Ahead of Onam!

unnormalised: Good news for all you folks in Kerala (and beyond!) thinking of going solar on your rooftop. The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) has announced that the rooftop solar subsidy scheme is still going strong!
normalised: Good news for all you folks in Kerala (and beyond!) thinking of going solar on your rooftop. The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) has announced that the rooftop solar subsidy scheme is still going strong!

unnormalised: Think of all that free sunshine going to waste! Installing a solar rooftop could save you a decent chunk of change on your electricity bills. Plus, you can contribute to a greener India!
normalised: Think of all that free sunshine going to waste! Installing a solar rooftop could save you a decent chunk of change on your electricity bills. Plus, you can contribute to a greener India!

unnormalised: The subsidy varies depending on the size of your installation. For systems up to 3 kW, expect a subsidy of around Rs. 14,588 per kW. For bigger systems, there's a slightly different slab.
normalised: The subsidy varies depending on the size of your installation. For systems up to three kilowatt, expect a subsidy of around rupee fourteen thousand five hundred and eighty eight per kilowatt. For bigger systems, there's a slightly different slab.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the scheme is particularly popular in states like Gujarat and Maharashtra. But hey, let's get Kerala up there too! Imagine powering your Onam celebrations with clean, solar energy. Think of the biryani you could cook!
normalised: Word on the street is that the scheme is particularly popular in states like Gujarat and Maharashtra. But hey, let's get Kerala up there too! Imagine powering your Onam celebrations with clean, solar energy. Think of the biryani you could cook!

unnormalised: Applications are easy; just head to the MNRE website or contact your local electricity distribution company (like KSEB). Don't wait too long, though! These subsidies are like hot samosas – they disappear fast. Last date to apply under current norms is October 31st, 2024. So, get cracking!
normalised: Applications are easy; just head to the M N R E website or contact your local electricity distribution company (like K S E B). Don't wait too long, though! These subsidies are like hot samosas – they disappear fast. Last date to apply under current norms is thirty first October two thousand and twenty four. So, get cracking!
